DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether nicotine is effective in the prevention of nausea and vomiting in non-smokers undergoing surgery
DOC.brief_title: Study of Nicotine for the Prevention of PONV
DOC.criteria: Adults (1880 years) ASA III, nonsmokers (or exsmokers who have not been smoking for more than 2 years) Undergoing elective surgery (ENT, abdominal, urological, gynaecological); and Consenting to take part in the study will be included. Smokers (cigarette, pipe, cigar) Patients undergoing nicotine replacement therapy Prolonged postoperative intubation Postoperative nasogastric tube
